text: 13 ContributorsRun LyricsThe title track and second single from Alison Wonderland’s debut namesake album, “Run” was written by Hayden Luby, Andrew Swanson, Zachary Urman, Scholler and produced by Scholler, Djemba Djemba, and AWE.
